Page Contents

    Brightcove Campaign™ Product Updates

    These are older release notes. Recent release notes for all products are now on this page: Product Release Notes.

    Brightcove Campaign Rebranding

    2 Jun 2021

    • Brightcove Campaign has been updated to correspond to the updated Brightcove branding.

    Reset Player Styling

    15 Jul 2020

    • It is now possible to reset the player styling settings back to the default. For more information, see Styling Players.

    Chrome Extension 2.0.5

    17 Jun 2020

    • Updated sign in form tabbing order

    v 1.4.0

    11 Jun 2020

    • Improved error handling and messaging

    Chrome Extension 2.0.4

    28 May 2020

    • Adjust padding on active nav links
    • Display additional login error codes
    • Bypass error display for 401 token expiration

    Player Styling

    28 May 2020

    • It is now possible to do some basic player styling. For more information, see Styling Players.

    v 1.3.1

    13 May 2020

    • Detect and handle scenarios where Audience plugin isn’t configured correctly
    • Display content type key when labels can’t be loaded via API
    • Clean up Campaign account edition logic

    Chrome Extension 2.0.2

    11 May 2020

    • Localized support documentation links
    • Added tooltips to navigation menu

    v 1.3.0

    6 May 2020

    • Localize documentation links
    • Fix inconsistent heading styles on Publish page

    Chrome Extension 2.0.1

    14 Apr 2020

    • Fixes a login bug
    • Fixes a bug with display of maximum allowed videos
    • Round averages for Analytics Gauge display
    • Round averages for no-content-type video analytics
    • Integrate Campaign common utility library
    • Removed tips coming soon message

    v 1.2.0

    7 Apr 2020

    • Ability to update Video Content Type for multiple videos
    • Add Salesforce support to Publish page
    • Updated translations for MAP/Lead forms admin cases
    • Round averages for Analytics Gauge displays
    • Round average percent viewed for opt-out dashboard
    • Remove “Advice coming soon” for now
    • Add lead forms docs link to Publish page

    Chrome Extension 2.0

    30 Mar 2020

    • Modified feature flag, enabled publish/videos list views
    • Removed duplicate video ids when querying content types
    • Added code to stick tooltip to bounds of gauge component
    • Publish UI: Added lead Fforms support to Connections page
    • Adding an extra sleep
    • Add support for BC_ACCOUNT cookie
    • Update campaign-common library to v1.0.1
    • Adjusted video data structure so it contains created_at, not published_at
    • Avoid unneeded content type calls
    • Restructured CSS, added redux handling of analytics load state

    v 1.1.0

    25 Mar 2020

    • Format created dates based on current language
    • Fix statbox sizing on Analytics page at certain browser sizes in IE11
    • Updated dashboard to show correct created date

    v 1.0.6

    10 Mar 2020

    • Fix link for More Analytics on Dashboard
    • Format video list creation date for consistency
    • Dashboard: Change label for published date to created

    Chrome Extension 1.1.0

    18 Feb 2020

    • Fix bug if average percent viewed is above 100
    • Fixed text overflow for non English localizations
    • Fix a bug to adjust the max-height of the extension
    • Fix a bug where clicking on 'Sign Out' leaves user hanging on loader

    v 1.0.5

    18 Feb 2020

    • Update date range for benchmark query to better handle processing backups
    • Use higher resolution thumbnail for Publish page, Video SEO Code, Facebook Tags, and image for email

    v 1.0.4

    16 Jan 2020

    • If benchmarks are not available, show "Unknown" for benchmarks instead of unavailable Dashboard
    • Improve video list visual style
    • Update MAP connections call to action if not an administrator

    v 1.0.1

    14 Jan 2020

    • Added "Learn More" link to SEO tips on Publish page
    • Adjusted sizing of player icon in Publish page email tab
    • Fix label for MAP Connections field on Publish page when no connections are set up
    • Added Publish page translations
    • Localized content types on Dashboard & Publish
    • Fix missing data bug in opt-out Dashboard
    • Show loading animation when switching query on Dashboard
    • Fix video.google.com link on Publish page
    • Improve layout of Dashboard at smaller window sizes
    • Improvements to Dashboard error handling and error messages
    • Improved localizations on Publish page

    Initial Release

    18 Dec 2019

    The initial release of Brightcove Campaign.
